mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM (content, deadTime, result, levelValue, type) VALUES (#{content}, #{deadTime}, #{result}, #{levelValue}, #{type})
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM SET content = #{content}, deadTime = #{deadTime}, result = #{result}, levelValue = #{levelValue}, type = #{type} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, content, deadTime, levelValue, type from ITEM where result = 0
SELECT id, content, deadTime, result, levelValue, type from ITEM where result = 1 OR result= 2
